title: Define Pet AI Model Architecture
description: Research and design the architecture for the AI model that will be used to train pets in AR.

title: Develop AR Experience for the App
description: Create an engaging and functional AR experience that allows users to train their pets.

title: Implement Computer Vision Algorithms for Pet Tracking
description: Develop computer vision algorithms to accurately track and identify the pet within the AR environment.

title: Design Personalized Training Sessions for Users
description: Create a system to generate personalized training sessions based on user and pet data.

title: Integrate AI and Computer Vision Modules
description: Merge the developed AI model and computer vision algorithms into the main application.
dependencies: Develop AR Experience for the App
Implement Computer Vision Algorithms for Pet Tracking

title: Test and Optimize AI and Computer Vision Performance
description: Perform extensive testing on the implemented AI and computer vision components, optimizing as needed.
dependencies: Integrate AI and Computer Vision Modules

title: Write Technical Documentation for the Project
description: Create comprehensive documentation detailing the design, implementation, and usage of the VirtualPetTrainer app.
dependencies: Integrate AI and Computer Vision Modules
Test and Optimize AI and Computer Vision Performance
